ooC: didn't see airly's last, so i waited an extra day, sorry for 
the delay if you were eager to post. ^^ Also i don't entirely know 
what happened to nightlight, only that she was transformed into 
blackstorm, or something like that, so i'm going to assume that she 
was totured a bit or something before being changed.

:: Hydras ::

Hydras had the upper hand, yes. He didn't, however, think that it 
totally rested on him keeping Nightlight alive. Rodimus was too... 
alive still, too energetic, too driven by anger. He wanted to 
torture the bot a bit.

Off comm lines, and so Rodimus couldn't hear him, he inclined his 
head to Maxima, "Maxima, produce an audio synth of nightlight's 
voice being totured, I wish for Rodimus to suffer more."

The the dark red and black draco-bot switched back to Rodimus' 
line. "Rodimus, I have a small parting gift for you before I leave 
you to wallow in your misery..." 

Hydras nods to Maxima.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus' optics narrow at the sight of his nemesis.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: It's not my fault that the Decepticons were all 
warlords. If the Predacons don't like being oppressed, they should 
blame their ancestors. The Pax Cybertronia was signed for a reason. 
Now as for Nightlight, you wont kill her. If you do, you'll lose 
your hold on me. And you are wrong. I'm not acting like a Predacon, 
but your damn right when you say I'm ruthless. You'll see just how 
ruthless I can be!
>
